${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1.
${ModID}:Rummage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of !M! random cards in hand by 1.

${ModID}:Cardistry.NAME: Cardistry
${ModID}:Cardistry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play this turn is returned to the top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:Cardistry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play this turn is returned to the top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:GreedyPitch.NAME: Greedy Pitch
${ModID}:GreedyPitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Greedy: Deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:PreppingUp.NAME: Prepping Up
${ModID}:PreppingUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${ModID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${ModID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL If your hand is full, gain 1 Intangible.
${ModID}:FullHouse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL If your hand is full, gain 1 Intangible.

${ModID}:PocketLint.NAME: Pocket Lint
${ModID}:PocketLint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${ModID}:RoadRage.NAME: Road Rage
${ModID}:RoadRage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL After you play 1 card, discard your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: After you play a card, discard your hand.

${ModID}:HeavySlam.NAME: Heavy SLam
${ModID}:HeavySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Greedy: Enemy loses !M! Strength.

${ModID}:GreedIsGood.NAME: Greed is Good
${ModID}:GreedIsGood.DESCRIPTION: While you're ${ModID}:Greedy, cards deal !M! additional damage and grant !M! additional Block.

${ModID}:HitTheBooks.NAME: Hit the Books
${ModID}:HitTheBooks.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Greedy: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Otherwise, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:BurningPocket.NAME: Burning Pocket
${ModID}:BurningPocket.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If this is Exhausted, add a *Miracle into your hand.

${ModID}:FromMyHat.NAME: From My Hat
${ModID}:FromMyHat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random Attack into your hand. NL It gains Retain.
